DOC.brief_summary: This is a pilot study which aims to determine the role of IMSI in poor responders.
DOC.brief_title: Use of IMSI in Poor Responders to IVF
DOC.detailed_description: This is a pilot study which aims to determine the role of IMSI over ICSI in poor responders to IVF, without a background of teratozoospermia.
DOC.criteria: poor ovarian response body mass index (BMI) â‰¥ 30 kg/m2 presence of endocrinopathies (e.g., diabetes, hyperprolactinemia, hypothyroidism) altered karyotype or documented genetic defects in one or both partners history of chronic, autoimmune or metabolic diseases altered meiosis in testicular biopsy or altered spermFISH teratozoospermia participation, simultaneously or within the previous 6 months, in another clinical trial with medication
